page.title: Grand Jury Probes AIG, S P Cuts Marsh
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - The storm over the U.S. insurance industry took a new turn Thursday when American International Group Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AIG.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AIG.N</A> said a federal grand jury is investigating products it sold that companies might have used to massage earnings.
